channel.title: Wtf router problem
channel.description:
i dont understand this. i am connected to both routers(not at the same time) thru wifi.
this is the router(main) connected to my modem: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1114446781.png[/img]
and this router is attached to the main one: [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1114454264.png[/img]
i havent tried yet but im guessing if i connect my pc thru ethernet to either router i will get better results.
anyone have any suggestions on how i can fix this. they both have the latest firmware availible. the download im pretty sure is suppose to be 10-20 mb/s and ul 1-5 mb/s.
edit: this is through ethernet:
main router: [URL=http://www.speedtest.net][IMG]http://www.speedtest.net/result/1122259760.png[/img][/URL]
wtf is up with these damn routers?

item.title: Wtf router problem
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

About 50 miles is the closest it gets. When I’m back at my house(Friday) ill do some more tests. Ones where I’m connected via ethernet to both routers one at a time. Then one test directly to the modem.

Read full topic

item.title: Wtf router problem
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Lol, comcast.

Are you sure you’re picking a server closest to your location?

Try picking other locations.

Read full topic
